task.summary: Soldiers reform after combat. Cannot be spawned beyond 1/5. Unit Holder for Unit Selector.
Fixed an issue where soldiers would engage a new target before reforming in unit.
Dead units disappear. Units have health bars (needs fixing).
Bug fix when spawning unit at edges.
A couple of TODOs and a method move.
Ballista & Catapult attributes loaded from prop file
Limited units in a level. Limits are high.
Default ballistas at each end. Adjustable tower sizes.
Report update, Player's Guide, Joe's feedback.
This was causing an error when using the command line.
